cab.content: his Document is the Property offernment.)Military Secret,722T" \xi . rf / 73 )&ffom Viceroy, Army Department, to the Secretary of State for India, Uh April 1918. (Received at India Office, 11 p.m.) HALL 6^ Marri situation, 4th April. Duki force successfully attacked M arris inposition north of Mamand. Enemy losses estimated at 70 dead on groundand equal number killed and wounded seen carried away. Mamand whichwas found deserted was readied in evening. Our casualties five wounded.
